casebody.data:
State of North Carolina
v.
Matthew Ryan Hoover No. 351P16 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 8, 2016 Bruce T. Cunningham, Jr., Attorney at Law, Southern Pines, for Matthew Ryan Hoover. Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, Joseph L. Hyde, Assistant Attorney General, Sarah Kirkman, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Petitioner on the 22nd of September 2016 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the Superior Court, Iredell County, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court of that County:

"Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of December 2016."
